name: Crabshoot
description:
One day, Crab Monster decided to conquer the universe. This was, according to SlimeMan, "evil" and "a bad idea".  SlimeMan decides to fight Crab Monster.

Suddenly, Crab Monster creates three shadows exactly like it. If you hit the shadow, you die. Can you figure out which one is real?

----

Crabshoot is a bullet hell game with four enemies, but only one is real.

----

Made for GMTK Game Jam 2019.

There's a browser version, but I wouldn't recommend it because it lags a lot.
